doc.field: - BSN Corp said it expects revenues of about 120 mln dlrs and a substantial increase in net income and earnings per share for 1987. Today it reported 1986 net income of 2,246,000 dlrs or 66 cts per share on revenues of 68.3 mln dlrs, up from 1,064,000 dlrs or 37 cts per share on revenues of 40.8 mln dlrs a year before.
